quotes.quote: Disney's something to be a little alarmed about. It's not just a little theme park anymore. It's now an ethic and outlook and strategy that goes way beyond central Florida.
I love theme parks but I'm a real chicken on rides. I'd rather invent scary rides for my books than go on them for real.
Life's like a roller coaster till it drops, but what should I scream for? This is my theme park.
Life is not a theme park, and if it is, the theme is death.
My wife loves Europe, but to me it's a bad day at a theme park.
New York is a theme park for people with IQs over 108.
Imagination ... is not a Disney theme park, but is a incredible force that when unleashed ... can help greatly better humanity.
'Florida is a theme park,' said Serge. And the theme is weirdness.
The sixties are like a theme park to them. They wear the costume, buy their tickets, and they have the experience.

If you go to a theme park, there will be so many rides. You will get an exciting experience in each of them. Like that, every film is an experience that entertains you. Some films will touch your heart. Some will touch you emotionally. There is nothing more than that.
